data.title: Phillip Spaulding
data.meta_description: Phillip Granville Spaulding is a fictional character on the CBS daytime soap opera Guiding Light. Jarrod Ross (November 7, 1977 to December 24, 1981 [Recurring]) Grant Aleksander (December 22, 1982 to December 28, 1984; December 1986 to February 18, 1991; March 8, 1996 to November 12, 2004...
